title: ZetaChain Secures a Whopping $27 Million in Recent Funding Round
description: In a significant move that underscores the growing importance of blockchain technology, ZetaChain announced on Wednesday that it has successfully raised $27 million in its latest funding round. This development is not just a testament to the potential of ZetaChain but also highlights the increasing interest of major players in the blockchain space. Major Players ... Read more

title: Valkyrie submits application for Ether futures ETF
description: Valkyrie, the asset management company, has applied to the US SEC for an Ether (ETH) futures ETF. This initiative follows Valkyrie’s earlier alteration of its investment approach for a Bitcoin (BTC) futures ETF to align with regulatory guidelines. According to…

title: BREAKING: Shiba Inu’s Shibarium Scaling Solution Goes Live, Poised for Massive Growth in SHIB Ecosystem – Could it Drive Price to $0.0001? Report
description: Shiba Inu unveils its eagerly awaited Shibarium scaling solution, signaling its evolution from a playful memecoin to a significant player in the blockchain sphere. title: After 16,000% Surge, Is New Dogecoin Rival Ready to Correct? Crypto Analytics Firm Santiment Tracks Wild Memecoin
description:
A crypto analytics firm is exploring whether a volatile memecoin that’s reached a $160 million market cap in three months has more fuel in the tank. Santiment says it’s keeping a close eye a couple of indicators to predict whether the wildly-named and inherently risky dog-related coin known as HarryPotterObamaSonic10Inu (BITCOIN) is ready to cool […]
